summary: This is a Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Daily Activity Report for July 24, 2019, documenting operational status, staff leave, and inmate population. It notably records inmate Jeffrey Epstein (#76318-054) as being on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The report is dated July 25, 2019, and details the daily activity for the previous day, July 24, 2019.
Inmate Jeffrey Epstein (Prisoner #76318-054) is listed as being on Suicide Watch with an inmate companion.
The report notes a shortage of staff, leading to the Special Housing Unit (SHU) #4 being vacated.
The total inmate population at the beginning of the Morning Watch shift on July 24, 2019, was 776.
The document is marked CONFIDENTIAL and is part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case file.
